verses.text: \w So|strong="H5265"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H5265"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Beersheba, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* God spoke \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*: “\w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*!” \w He|strong="H3478"\w* said. “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* am,” replied \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am God,” \w He|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* father. \w Do|strong="H3381"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1471"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w surely|strong="H5927"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w close|strong="H7896"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* departed \w from|strong="H3478"\w* Beersheba, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w wagons|strong="H5699"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w along|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wives.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* also \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3290"\w* \w acquired|strong="H7408"\w* \w in|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w* \w went|strong="H3290"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. Those Who Went to Egypt (Exodus 1:1–7)

Jacob took \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandsons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w granddaughters|strong="H1323"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w offspring|strong="H2233"\w*. The Children of Leah
Now these are the names of the sons of Israel (Jacob and his descendants) who went to Egypt: Reuben, Jacob’s firstborn.
The sons of Reuben: Hanoch, Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.

The sons of Simeon: Jemuel,\f + \fr 46:10 \ft Jemuel is another name for Nemuel; see Numbers 26:12.\f* Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar,\f + \fr 46:10 \ft Zohar is a variant of Zerah; see Numbers 26:13 and 1 Chronicles 4:24.\f* and Shaul the son of a Canaanite woman.
The sons of Levi: Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
The sons of Judah: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez, and Zerah; but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. The sons of Perez: Hezron and Hamul.

The sons of Issachar: Tola, Puvah,\f + \fr 46:13 \ft Hebrew; SP and Syriac Puah; see 1 Chronicles 7:1.\f* Job,\f + \fr 46:13 \ft Hebrew; SP and some LXX manuscripts Jashub; see Numbers 26:24 and 1 Chronicles 7:1.\f* and Shimron.
The sons of Zebulun: Sered, Elon, and Jahleel.

These are the sons of Leah born to Jacob in Paddan-aram,\f + \fr 46:15 \ft That is, northwest Mesopotamia\f* in addition to his daughter Dinah. The total number of sons and daughters was thirty-three. The Children of Zilpah

The sons of Gad: Ziphion,\f + \fr 46:16 \ft SP and LXX Zephon; see also Numbers 26:15.\f* Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi,\f + \fr 46:16 \ft Arodi is a variant of Arod; see Numbers 26:17.\f* and Areli.
The children of Asher: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, and their sister Serah. The sons of Beriah: Heber and Malchiel.
These are the sons of Jacob born to Zilpah—whom Laban gave to his daughter Leah—sixteen in all. The Children of Rachel
The sons of Jacob’s wife Rachel: Joseph and Benjamin.
Manasseh and Ephraim were born to Joseph in the land of Egypt by Asenath daughter of Potiphera, priest of On.\f + \fr 46:20 \ft That is, Heliopolis, as in LXX\f*
The sons of Benjamin: Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim, and Ard.
These are the sons of Rachel born to Jacob—fourteen in all. The Children of Bilhah
The son of Dan: Hushim.
The sons of Naphtali: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer, and Shillem.
These are the sons of Jacob born to Bilhah, whom Laban gave to his daughter Rachel—seven in all.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* belonging \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w direct|strong="H3409"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w*, besides \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*—numbered \w sixty-six|strong="H8346"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \f + \fr 46:27 \ft Hebrew; LXX the nine sons, probably including Joseph’s grandsons through Ephraim and Manasseh; see 1 Chronicles 7:14–29.\f* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w members|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H3290"\w* \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \f + \fr 46:27 \ft Hebrew (see also Exodus 1:5); LXX (see also Acts 7:14) seventy-five\f* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*. Jacob Arrives in Egypt

\w Now|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w get|strong="H7971"\w* \w directions|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*. \w When|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w*’s family arrived \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*,

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* prepared \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* father \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w presented|strong="H7200"\w* \w himself|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, embraced \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* profusely.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “Finally \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*!”

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w inform|strong="H5046"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: ‘\w My|strong="H5046"\w* brothers \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* father’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* raise \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w*.’

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w summons|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H6547"\w* asks, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w occupation|strong="H4639"\w*?’

\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* say, ‘\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* raised \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w* ever \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*—\w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* fathers.’ \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* allowed \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*.”
